description:
Version 8.9 on a 4-core modern APU takes 5.5 minutes to load the flatpak from the time you click the icon to the time the IDE window appears.

I feel like I need to be inserting floppy disks like back in the day for this amount of waiting time.
Even (+ 1 1) takes up to a minute to compile with my modern gaming computer
summary: Incredibly slow to start up and compile

description: I saw other reviews that saying this is slow, but i've tested it on my slow ryzen 3250u and it works perfectly fine. Feel free to use!

Only writing this review to counter the earlier ones about slow speed. Maybe they fixed it in a later version than those people were using but it starts instantly for me and programs compile quickly too.

Haven't yet spent enough time with the app to otherwise comment on it.
